title: An alternative module schematic
description: Creates a new feature NgModule definition in the given or default project in Baumblatt's opinionated way.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the NgModule?

path.description: The path at which to create the NgModule, relative to the workspace root.

route.description: The route path for a lazy-loaded module. When supplied, creates a component in the new module, and adds the route to that component in the `Routes` array declared in the module provided in the `--module` option.

lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the module.

slice.description: When present, create a slice of the Store with this name.

verbose.description: Display additional details about internal operations during execution.
